Song.title: You'll Provide For Me
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Stephen Altrogge © 2005 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: Em | C2/E | G | Bm :||]
Verse 1: O [Em]Lord, You [C/E]care for all the e[G]arth The [Bm]flowers and the b[Em]irds You pro[C/E]vide their daily b[D]read [| D] How much [Em]more [C/E]You have cared for [G]me You [Bm]met my greatest n[Em]eed When [C/E]Christ hung on the t[D | D]ree So I [C2]know that You’ll provide for [D]me
Chorus: So [G]God, I trust in [G/C]You I trust in [Em]You, I [D]trust in [G/C]You In what[Em]ever I may f[D/F#]ace I will [Em]trust Your sovereign g[D]race [C2]I will [D]always trust in Y[Em (to intro)]ou
Verse 2: O [Em]Lord, when [C/E]all my hopes and [G]plans Are t[Bm]aken from my h[Em]ands And I [C/E]cannot see the w[D | D]ay I will [Em]rest [C/E]in Your sovereign [G]plan And [Bm]bless Your gracious h[Em]and I [C/E]know Your promise [D | D]stands That I’ll [C2]see Your goodness in this l[D]and
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 o lord you care for all the earth the flowers and the birds you provide their daily bread how much more you have cared for me you met my greatest need when christ hung on the tree so i know that youll provide for me chorus so god i trust in you i trust in you i trust in you in whatever i may face i will trust your sovereign grace i will always trust in you verse 2 o lord when all my hopes and plans are taken from my hands and i cannot see the way i will rest in your sovereign plan and bless your gracious hand i know your promise stands that ill see your goodness in this land
